title: ATypI fall-out - Part 2
content: I'm hard at work writing up my ATypI report. First episode tonight. I will be asking around for some images, as I concentrated on writing notes and didn't take the time to take pictures (apart from [this one](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013052650/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/18918759@N00/257909525/)).
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content: [Day One](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013052650/http:/www.fontshop.be/) has been up since last night BTW. Please feel free to comment on Unzipped rather than here.

I enjoyed your Erik story--I can see that wry deadpan of his now as he says, "Perhaps unintentionally"

:-)

ChrisL
